main event: A UFO sighting was reported over Lake Canton, Canton, Illinois on March 7, 1967, where an object was described as round, metallic, and hovering.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 30 feet in diameter and silvery in color., It appeared to be rotating slowly., The witness observed the object for about 5 minutes before it accelerated rapidly and disappeared., There was no sound reported during the sighting., Good visibility conditions were present at the time.
witness description: Mr. John Smith of Canton, Illinois, good reliability.
